description:
The July 4 long holiday weekend is here, and while you should certainly spend it relaxing with friends and family, it’s also a time to score excellent discounts on the latest gear. We understand that you’d want to do your shopping as quickly as possible to maximize your relaxation time, so we’ve found the best […]

The post 40+ of the best 4th of July sales: Grills, TVs, tools, and more appeared first on Popular Science.
title: 40+ of the best 4th of July sales: Grills, TVs, tools, and more

description:
Until 2019, the computer system that controlled the USA’s nuclear arsenal famously relied on eight-inch floppy disks, a format you probably have to be in your fifties to have ever laid eyes on. One would be forgiven for thinking that the phasing-out of that system might have been the last we’d hear of the floppy […]

The post Japan’s government is (finally) done with floppy disks appeared first on Popular Science.
title: Japan’s government is (finally) done with floppy disks

description:
What’s the weirdest thing you learned this week? Well, whatever it is, we promise you’ll have an even weirder answer if you listen to PopSci’s hit podcast. The Weirdest Thing I Learned This Week hits Apple, Spotify, YouTube, and everywhere else you listen to podcasts every-other Wednesday morning. It’s your new favorite source for the […]

title: These viking ladies tried to start a trend for pointy heads, but it didn’t take off
